title: Fantasy Factory blocky font
content:
What's the thick font used for the "Fantasy Factory" text?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [456x330.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015212718/http:/typophile.com/files/456x330.jpg) | 33.53 KB |
author: joejohnson9182

comments.content: I wouldn't know, but maybe take a look at this FontList of [Extreme Extra Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015212718/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/genres/extra_bold_extreme/?&sample_text=Fantasy%20Factory) typefaces.
Take a look at these Fat Fonts too: [LINK](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015212718/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42643)
